Well my first craft post so hope you like it, as the title says its a 7 kerbal SSTO crew shuttle that i made and have been tweaking today.

The shuttle was designed for moving crew between Kerbin's surface and her moons or any other orbital stations. Orbital refueling and the addition of landing struts makes it possible to perform moon landings, crew transfer from the surface via a ladder reaching to the floor from the hab unit.

Action Groups

1. Turbojet Engines

2. Lv-N Atomic Engine

3. Air Intakes

4. Landing Struts

Flight Profile

To be honest i'm lazy and use mechjeb most of the time to hold pitch, roll and heading (as you can see its attached to the craft in the pics) and I manage to get to 80Km orbit with 1400-1500 ÃŽâ€v remaining.
